text.p:
This manual provides information about usage of the Mii Creator website and all of its features.
For more information (including its internal functionality, programming) and for any feedback/error reports relating to the site, please email the following email address:
datkat21@gmail.com
This site is not associated with Nintendo.

Hello!, my name is Dani, and this is Emily, we're Miis, and we're both going to guide you to usage of Mii Creator, everything about it, and everything you can DO with it, assuming this is your first time using the site.

Mii Creator is a program that allows you to create Mii characters for yourself, family members, friends, other characters, and anyone, export them to different formats, including QR Code and all the known Mii data formats, and customize the way these Mii characters look.
To know more about Mii characters themselves, check Page 3 of this e-manual.
Mii Characters are avatars that can represent anyone and anything you want!

With many customization opportunities possible, and some new additions exclusive to this program, there are never limitations.
Start creating your Mii characters now and gather a lot of them, create QR Codes and share them to your friends and everyone!
These are all the features a Mii character have that can be customized:

td.p:
This changes different features of your Mii character's head.
Such as:

This changes the hair type/color of your Mii character's head.
Also allows you to change the hair orientation.

This sets a hat/custom hat with a custom color for your Mii character to wear.
This feature is experimental and only available on Mii Creator-format Mii characters.
This changes the eyebrows type of your Mii character's head.
This changes the eyebrows type/color of your Mii character.
This changes the nose type and position of your Mii character.
This changes the mouth type/color/position of your Mii character.
This changes the mustache/beard facial features and their color/position from your Mii character.
This enables a mole and allows you to change its position/size from your Mii character.
This enables glasses and allows you to change its type/color/position/size from your Mii character.
This allows you to change the height and width of your Mii character.

This allows you to change the favorite color and shirt (or skirt, if set to Female) /pants color for your Mii character.
The shirt/pants custom color feature is experimental and only available on Mii Creator-format Mii characters.
This sets a gender to your Mii character, setting it to male makes your Mii character use a shirt, while setting it to female changes it to a dress.

This allows you to set a name and creator for your Mii character.
You can set custom characters and emojis, but the original name will only be kept on the Mii Creator-format Mii characters.

text.p: To check more information about Mii data formats and their compatibility, check Page 7

Be advised that some features are exclusive to Mii Creator and its format, Mii Creator features from a Mii data format (QR Code/Mii Creator-format (.miic)) will be only transferred from Mii Creator itself.
All Mii Creator QR Codes are compatible with Wii U/3DS/Miitomo, however, Switch colors and extra data for Mii Creator-only features won't be transferred.

Trying to export Mii Creator-format Mii characters to other formats like Wii U/3DS/Switch formats won't migrate the new features (colored shirts/pants will default to the Mii character's favorite color), however Switch colors will be kept
Also, trying to export Mii characters with Switch features on a Wii U/3DS format will make unavailable types/colors be replaced with the closest counterpart.
